statements.delete: DELETE FROM SEC_MENURIGHTS WHERE RIGHTSID=#RIGHTSID# DELETE FROM SEC_MENURIGHTSMEMBER WHERE RIGHTSID=#RIGHTSID# DELETE FROM SEC_MENURIGHTSOBJECT WHERE RIGHTSID=#RIGHTSID#
DELETE FROM SEC_MENURIGHTSMEMBER WHERE RIGHTSID=#RIGHTSID# DELETE FROM SEC_MENURIGHTSOBJECT WHERE RIGHTSID=#RIGHTSID#
statements.update: UPDATE SEC_MENURIGHTS SET RIGHTSID=#RIGHTSID# ,RIGHTSNAME=#RIGHTSNAME# ,MEMBERNAME=#MEMBERNAME# ,MEMBERID=#MEMBERID# ,REMARK=#REMARK# ,UPDATEDATE=#UPDATEDATE# ,UPDATEBY=#UPDATEBY# WHERE RIGHTSID=#RIGHTSID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO SEC_MENURIGHTSOBJECT ( ID, RIGHTSID ,MENUID ) VALUES( #ID#, #RIGHTSID# ,#MENUID# )
statements.select: SELECT B.* FROM SEC_MENURIGHTSMEMBER A INNER JOIN SEC_MENURIGHTSOBJECT B ON A.RIGHTSID=B.RIGHTSID WHERE A.MEMBERID=#USERID# AND A.MEMBERTYPE='USER' UNION SELECT B.* FROM SEC_MENURIGHTSMEMBER A INNER JOIN SEC_MENURIGHTSOBJECT B ON A.RIGHTSID=B.RIGHTSID WHERE A.MEMBERID IN ($DEPT$) AND A.MEMBERTYPE='DEPT' UNION SELECT B.* FROM SEC_MENURIGHTSMEMBER A INNER JOIN SEC_MENURIGHTSOBJECT B ON A.RIGHTSID=B.RIGHTSID WHERE A.MEMBERID IN ($GROUP$) AND A.MEMBERTYPE='GROUP'
